title: Breaking New Ground
lyrics:
Shovel on my hands, sweat on my shirt
Been workin' for a while boys, on this pile of dirt
Tryin' to dig a little deeper, in a hard rock town
No it ain't easy, breakin' new ground
Burnin' in the hot sun, soakin' in the rain
Gettin' pretty good at, smilin' through the pain

About to the point where, most turn around

No it ain't easy, breakin' new ground



It's a long hard day, but you sleep at night

It's an inch by inch push on down the line

Only one way through, just get up and do

It again, and again, and again, and again, and again



It's gonna take time and its gonna take heart

Yeah that bedrock baby it don't just fall apart

If you're lookin' for the good stuff, it's a little further down

It sure ain't easy, breakin' new ground



It's a long hard day, but you sleep at night

It's an inch by inch push on down the line

Only one way through, just get up and do

It again, and again, and again, and again, and again



If you want it bad enough, no you won't back down

But it ain't easy, breakin' new ground

It ain't easy, breakin' new ground



Shovel on my hands, sweat on my shirt

It ain't easy
